about_the_game:
Deathtrap Dungeon: The Golden Room is an interactive movie based on Ian Livingstone's multi-million selling classic gamebook. Become the adventurer on their quest to the Golden Room.

As the Brave Adventurer faces many foes, you must tread carefully on your quest through to the Golden Room. Face the Trial-Master of the Dungeon Vhaidra and her tricks and traps as she tests your skill. Beware of the Bloodbeast lurking behind any door.
Decide wisely, or find yourself in a Deathtrap.

• One story, several different paths, endings… and deaths.
• A completely live action, cinematic interactive fantasy adventure movie.
• Featuring the same CGI Virtual Set technology as used in The Mandalorian.
• From the studio that brought you The Complex, Five Dates and Maid of Sker.
• Starring Georgia Hirst (Five Dates, Vikings) and Marcus Fraser (Transformers: The Last Knight)



Made with the support of Clwstwr, which is funded through the Creative Industries Clusters Programme and Creative Wales
detailed_description:
Deathtrap Dungeon: The Golden Room is an interactive movie based on Ian Livingstone's multi-million selling classic gamebook. Become the adventurer on their quest to the Golden Room.

As the Brave Adventurer faces many foes, you must tread carefully on your quest through to the Golden Room. Face the Trial-Master of the Dungeon Vhaidra and her tricks and traps as she tests your skill. Beware of the Bloodbeast lurking behind any door.
Decide wisely, or find yourself in a Deathtrap.

• One story, several different paths, endings… and deaths.
• A completely live action, cinematic interactive fantasy adventure movie.
• Featuring the same CGI Virtual Set technology as used in The Mandalorian.
• From the studio that brought you The Complex, Five Dates and Maid of Sker.
• Starring Georgia Hirst (Five Dates, Vikings) and Marcus Fraser (Transformers: The Last Knight)



Made with the support of Clwstwr, which is funded through the Creative Industries Clusters Programme and Creative Wales

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+ 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Deathtrap Dungeon: The Golden Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
